entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
